metadata.dc:title: Complications caused by intravenous therapy
metadata.dc:description: Nursing professionals must know everything related to complications caused by intravenous therapy, including the ways to prevent and solve these complications. We need not forget that nurses are the ones mainly responsible for the insertion, manipulation, removal and care of catheters
metadata.dc:creator: Quirós Luque, José María
Gago Fornells, Manuel
metadata.dc:description: Enfermería debe conocer todo lo relativo a las complicaciones de la terapia intravenosa para prevenirlas y solventarlas. No olvidemos que es la principal responsable de la inserción, manipulación, retirada y cuidados de catéteres
metadata.dc:title: Complicaciones de la terapia intravenosa
metadata.dc:subject: ^d19210^s22020
